Player History
Drafted in 8th round, 125th overall pick, by Chicago in 2015...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/2/2015, off Alonso Maestas (SLB)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/2/2015, off Alonso Maestas (SLB)...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/15/2015, hitting .400 with 3 HR, 5 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Seattle on 8/9/2015...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/1/2016, hitting .417 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against St. Louis (B) on 5/1/2016...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Kansas City on 6/12/2016...
Won Gold Glove at Centerfield in 2016...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago on 2/8/2018 to a 4-year deal worth $2,500,009 per year...
Injured on 8/20/2018 with a Sore Knee, out for one week...
